wikipedia_page.main: Barbara Margaret Trimble née Gill (born 15 or 21 February 1921 – died 1995) was a British writer of more than 20 crime, thriller and romance novels between 1967 to 1991, under the names of Margaret Blake, B. M. Gill and Barbara Gilmour.

response: *Barbara Margaret Trimble (1921–1995) a British writer of over 20 crime, thriller and romance novels
* Barbara Margaret Trimble, British crime/thriller writer
